quote: I busted a mirror and got seven years bad luck, but my lawyer thinks he can get me five.
name: Steven Wright

quote: Collecting more taxes than is absolutely necessary is legalized robbery.
name: Calvin Coolidge

quote: A successful lawsuit is the one worn by a policeman.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Make crime pay. Become a lawyer.
name: Will Rogers

quote: Justice in the life and conduct of the State is possible only as first it resides in the hearts and souls of the citizens.
name: Plato

quote: People are getting smarter nowadays they are letting lawyers, instead of their conscience, be their guide.
name: Will Rogers

quote: Compromise is the best and cheapest lawyer.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: The more laws, the less justice.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Laws are spider webs through which the big flies pass and the little ones get caught.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Lawsuit: A machine which you go into as a pig and come out of as a sausage.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: In law, nothing is certain but the expense.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Advertising is legalized lying.
name: H. G. Wells

quote: Obedience to lawful authority is the foundation of manly character.
name: Robert E. Lee

quote: A lean compromise is better than a fat lawsuit.
name: George Herbert

quote: Avoid lawsuits beyond all things they pervert your conscience, impair your health, and dissipate your property.
name: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: The trouble with law is lawyers.
name: Clarence Darrow

quote: Justice delayed is justice denied.
name: William E. Gladstone

quote: Lawyers, I suppose, were children once.
name: Charles Lamb

quote: He is no lawyer who cannot take two sides.
name: Charles Lamb

quote: All ambitions are lawful except those which climb upward on the miseries or credulities of mankind.
name: Joseph Conrad

quote: It is legal because I wish it.
name: Louis XIV

quote: Deceive not thy physician, confessor, nor lawyer.
name: George Herbert

quote: You can't learn everything you need to know legally.
name: John Irving

quote: Lawyers are the only persons in whom ignorance of the law is not punished.
name: Jeremy Bentham

quote: Judges are the weakest link in our system of justice, and they are also the most protected.
name: Alan Dershowitz

quote: I'm trusting in the Lord and a good lawyer.
name: Oliver North

quote: Where there is a will there is a lawsuit.
name: Addison Mizner

quote: Lawyers spend a great deal of their time shoveling smoke.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: I have a different approach. I don't file lawsuits because I really don't care.
name: Nicole Kidman

quote: Misery is the company of lawsuits.
name: Francois Rabelais

quote: People do not win people fights. Lawyers do.
name: Norman Ralph Augustine

quote: Frivolous lawsuits are booming in this county. The U.S. has more costs of litigation per person than any other industrialized nation in the world, and it is crippling our economy.
name: Jack Kingston

quote: The events of the day inspired me to become a lawyer.
name: Christopher Darden

quote: If somebody invented cigarettes today, the government would not legalize them.
name: Loni Anderson

quote: A good lawyer is a bad Christian.
name: John Lothrop Motley

quote: Ignorance of the law excuses no man from practicing it.
name: Addison Mizner

quote: I would say that IQ is the strongest predictor of which field you can get into and hold a job in, whether you can be an accountant, lawyer or nurse, for example.
name: Daniel Goleman

quote: The law has no compassion. And justice is administered without compassion.
name: Christopher Darden

quote: We are led by lawyers who do not understand either technology or balance sheets.
name: Thomas Friedman

quote: Lawyers are the first refuge of the incompetent.
name: Aaron Allston

quote: I used to want to be a lawyer, but I didn't want to have half my brain sucked out.
name: Max Walker

quote: It costs a lot to sue a magazine, and it's too bad that we don't have a system where the losing team has to pay the winning team's lawyers.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: Cagey trial lawyers have figured out there's a pretty good likelihood their case - no matter what its merit - will literally get its day in court because of favorable judges.
name: Dennis Hastert

quote: The only people who benefit from lawsuits are lawyers. I think we made a couple of them rich.
name: Gavin Rossdale

quote: I have been surrounded by some of the smartest, brightest, most caring lawyers, by agents who are willing to risk their lives for others, by support staff that are willing to work as hard as they can.
name: Janet Reno

quote: The good lawyer is the great salesman.
name: Janet Reno

quote: I come from a profession which has suffered greatly because of the lack of civility. Lawyers treat each other poorly and it has come home to haunt them. The public will not tolerate a lack of civility.
name: James E. Rogers

quote: I'm not sure I can say there is a clean line between me as an individual and me as a lawyer.
name: Anita Hill

quote: One of the things I was taught in law school is that I'd never be able to think the same again - that being a lawyer is something that's part of who I am as an individual now.
name: Anita Hill

quote: Lawsuits should not be used to destroy a viable and independent distribution system. The solution lies in the marketplace and not the courtroom.
name: Don Henley

quote: Unfortunately, what many people forget is that judges are just lawyers in robes.
name: Tammy Bruce

quote: To some lawyers, all facts are created equal.
name: Felix Frankfurter

quote: As a private lawyer, I could bill $750 an hour, but I don't.
name: Jay Alan Sekulow

quote: I wouldn't pretend to tell you we don't pay our lawyers well.
name: Jay Alan Sekulow

quote: I'm afraid I talk a lot, too much, perhaps. I should have been a lawyer or a college professor or a windy politician, though I'm glad I am not any of these.
name: Tom Glazer

quote: A married woman has the same right to control her own body as does an unmarried woman.
name: Sol Wachtler

quote: To force a lawyer on a defendant can only lead him to believe that the law contrives against him.
name: Potter Stewart

quote: As a rule lawyers tend to want to do whatever they can to win.
name: Bill Williams

quote: Lawsuit abuse is a major contributor to the increased costs of healthcare, goods and services to consumers.
name: Charles W. Pickering

quote: I decided I wanted to be a lawyer when I was 11 years of age.
name: Johnnie Cochran

quote: All the libel lawyers will tell you there's no libel any more, that everyone's given up.
name: Ian Hislop

quote: As for lawyers, it's more fun to play one than to be one.
name: Sam Waterston

quote: It is impossible to tell where the law stops and justice begins.
name: Arthur Baer

quote: I have been committed to carrying out my duties... in accordance with both the letter and spirit of all applicable rules of ethics and canons of conduct.
name: Samuel Alito

quote: A lawyer who does not know men is handicapped.
name: William Dunbar

quote: They don't need a lawyer, they need a toastmaster.
name: Edward Bennett Williams

quote: I never saw a lawyer yet who would admit he was making money.
name: Mary Roberts Rinehart

quote: If the laws could speak for themselves, they would complain of the lawyers in the first place.
name: Lord Halifax

quote: From your confessor, lawyer and physician, hide not your case on no condition.
name: John Harington

quote: Never forget that everything Hitler did in Germany was legal.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Potentially, a government is the most dangerous threat to man's rights: it holds a legal monopoly on the use of physical force against legally disarmed victims.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: Gambling is legal and betting is legal, for what I bet.
name: Michael Jordan

quote: Love is moral even without legal marriage, but marriage is immoral without love.
name: Ellen Key

quote: You cannot have maternal health without reproductive health. And reproductive health includes contraception and family planning and access to legal, safe abortion.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: The duty of government is to leave commerce to its own capital and credit as well as all other branches of business, protecting all in their legal pursuits, granting exclusive privileges to none.
name: Andrew Jackson

quote: Children must be considered in a divorce considered valuable pawns in the nasty legal and financial contest that is about to ensue.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: In terms of the legal matter of creating a contract between two people that's called marriage, and allowing them to live together with the protection of law, it seems to me is the way we should be moving in this country.
name: Colin Powell

quote: Baseball is a game where a curve is an optical illusion, a screwball can be a pitch or a person, stealing is legal and you can spit anywhere you like except in the umpire's eye or on the ball.
name: James Patrick Murray

quote: I know how easy it is for one to stay well within moral, ethical, and legal bounds through the skillful use of words - and to thereby spin, sidestep, circumvent, or bend a truth completely out of shape. To that extent, we are all liars on numerous occasions.
name: Sidney Poitier

quote: After the chaos and carnage of September 11th, it is not enough to serve our enemies with legal papers.
name: George W. Bush

quote: The legal system is often a mystery, and we, its priests, preside over rituals baffling to everyday citizens.
name: Henry Miller

quote: No oppression is so heavy or lasting as that which is inflicted by the perversion and exorbitance of legal authority.
name: Joseph Addison

quote: Hitler never abandoned the cloak of legality he recognized the enormous psychological value of having the law on his side. Instead, he turned the law inside out and made illegality legal.
name: Robert Byrd

quote: In my role as Wikileaks editor, I've been involved in fighting off many legal attacks. To do that, and keep our sources safe, we have had to spread assets, encrypt everything, and move telecommunications and people around the world to activate protective laws in different national jurisdictions.
name: Julian Assange

quote: As Congress continues to debate ways to address illegal immigration, we must remember the many hard-working legal immigrants that contribute so much to our nation's economy and culture.
name: Bob Filner

quote: We owe the Aboriginal peoples a debt that is four centuries old. It is their turn to become full partners in developing an even greater Canada. And the reconciliation required may be less a matter of legal texts than of attitudes of the heart.
name: Romeo LeBlanc

quote: The Supreme Court ruled that disabled golfer Casey Martin has a legal right to ride in a golf cart between shots at PGA Tour events. Man, the next thing you know, they're going to have some guy carry his clubs around for him.
name: Jon Stewart

quote: But my humble opinion is, I'm not quite sure where I stand on the legalization of drugs - though, if tequila is legal, pot should probably be legal.
name: Ted Demme

quote: Like all other law-abiding Americans, I fully support legal immigration.
name: Ted Nugent

quote: Men's indignation, it seems, is more excited by legal wrong than by violent wrong the first looks like being cheated by an equal, the second like being compelled by a superior.
name: Thucydides

quote: It's impossible to walk a block in Miami, in Los Angeles, San Antonio without running into someone who is being deeply impacted by a broken legal immigration system.
name: Marco Rubio

quote: I think a child should be allowed to take his father's or mother's name at will on coming of age. Paternity is a legal fiction.
name: James Joyce

quote: We should be the pro-legal immigration party. A party that has a positive platform and agenda on how we can create a legal immigration system that works for immigrants and works for America.
name: Marco Rubio

quote: We must have great respect for these people who also suffer and who want to find their own way of correct living. On the other hand, to create a legal form of a kind of homosexual marriage, in reality, does not help these people.
name: Joseph Ratzinger

quote: However, there is no legal and legitimate state called Israel.
name: Hassan Nasrallah

quote: We must have great respect for these people who also suffer and who want to find their own way of correct living. On the other hand, to create a legal form of a kind of homosexual marriage, in reality, does not help these people.
name: Pope Benedict XVI

quote: Well, when I think of steroids I think of an image. You have the advantage over someone, which is a form of cheating. I guess it wouldn't be right unless it was legal for everybody. Reason it's not legal for everybody is because it can hurt people seriously.
name: Evander Holyfield

quote: I do not believe abortion should be legal.
name: Herman Cain

quote: Anybody who thinks talk is cheap should get some legal advice.
name: Franklin P. Jones

quote: I have spent all my life under a Communist regime, and I will tell you that a society without any objective legal scale is a terrible one indeed. But a society with no other scale but the legal one is not quite worthy of man either.
name: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quote: All the legal action I've taken against newspapers has had a massively positive effect on my life and achieved exactly what I wanted, which is privacy and non-harassment.
name: Sienna Miller

quote: I would often find myself, at the age of 21, at midnight, running down a dark street on my own with 10 men chasing me. And the fact they had cameras in their hands made that legal.
name: Sienna Miller

quote: Things happened there that I don't think are the finest hours for anybody, whether it was a journalist, the legal system or, in that case of the political system, who would say that was an example of when Washington worked best.
name: Rahm Emanuel

quote: These endless legal challenges that define elections in New York are a joke in this country, and they are the reason why it is so expensive, or one of the reasons, it's so expensive to run here and why so many people decide not to run.
name: Michael Bloomberg

quote: We have to get control of our borders. You can only do that if you make companies obey the law and not hire undocumented or illegals. They can only do that is if they have a Social Security Card that has biometrics so they know whether the person is legal or not.
name: Michael Bloomberg

quote: In Psalm 72, Solomon prays for power and fame but he says the purpose of influence is to speak up for others and one is the immigrant. He doesn't delineate between legal and illegal.
name: Rick Warren

quote: So the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund is out there preserving and fighting for, and sometimes winning and sometimes losing, the fight for First Amendment rights in comics and, more generally, for freedom of speech.
name: Neil Gaiman

quote: I don't know of many evangelicals who want to deny gay couples their legal rights. However, most of us don't want to call it marriage, because we think that word has religious connotations, and we're not ready to see it used in ways that offend us.
name: Tony Campolo

quote: I contend the state ought to do its thing and provide legal rights for all couples who want to be joined together for life. The church should bless unions that it sees fit to bless, and they should be called marriages.
name: Tony Campolo

quote: I propose that the government should get out of the business of marrying people and, instead, only give legal status to civil unions.
name: Tony Campolo

quote: I mean, in some cases with libel laws, you know, they can write things about people who have no course of action, because they can't afford to take legal action against them.
name: Elton John

quote: Are hackers a threat? The degree of threat presented by any conduct, whether legal or illegal, depends on the actions and intent of the individual and the harm they cause.
name: Kevin Mitnick

quote: As legal slavery passed, we entered into a permanent period of unemployment and underemployment from which we have yet to emerge.
name: Julian Bond

quote: Gay marriage is the last bastion of, to me... as a legal, ceremonial, sentimental and religious side, it's one of the last steps. Retaining your job being one of the earlier steps, like, not getting kicked out of your job because you're gay.
name: Gus Van Sant

quote: Every one with this writ may be a tyrant if this commission be legal, a tyrant in a legal manner, also, may control, imprison, or murder any one within the realm.
name: James Otis

quote: I've thought hard about my psychological connections and I think I've managed to separate out the psychological from the legal, moral, and political.
name: Alan Dershowitz

quote: I think mistakes are the essence of science and law. It's impossible to conceive of either scientific progress or legal progress without understanding the important role of being wrong and of mistakes.
name: Alan Dershowitz

quote: And understandably so, that when you're in legal jeopardy, you really cannot put yourself in a position to open yourself up to the media.
name: Monica Lewinsky

quote: All of the legal defense funds out there, they're looking for people out there with court of appeals experience, because court of appeals is where policy is made. And I know, I know this is on tape and I should never say that because we don't make law, I know. I know.
name: Sonia Sotomayor

quote: Reading a script is usually as exciting as reading a boilerplate legal document, so when you read one that makes you feel as if you're seeing the movie, you know it's something different.
name: Tom Hanks

quote: I remember when I took Quentin Tarantino with me to a very private screening of the documentary 'Roman Polanski: Wanted and Desired,' which shows some of the legal irregularities of his case. I was involved by the film, and it was an amazing experience to see people weep at the end of it.

quote: Defining marriage is a power that should be left to the states. Moreover, no state should be forced to recognize a marriage that is not within its own laws, Constitution, and legal precedents.
name: John Sununu

quote: You can't solve a problem as complex as inequality in one legal clause.
name: Theresa May

quote: Is not liberty the destruction of all despotism - including, of course, legal despotism?
name: Frederic Bastiat

quote: It is hard to see Judge Roberts as a judicial activist who would place ideological purity or a particular agenda above or ahead the need for thoughtful legal reasoning.
name: Ron Wyden

quote: When I was 27 years old, I organized legal aid clinics to help low-income seniors. It was a life-altering experience.
name: Ron Wyden

quote: I have written about the dispossessed, immigrants, the condition of women who do not enjoy the same legal rights as men, the Palestinians who are deprived of their land and condemned to exile.
name: Tahar Ben Jelloun

quote: Most of what needs to be changed in the euro zone can be done without treaty changes. The demand for treaty change is as political as it is legal and I don't think it's going to happen soon.
name: Nick Clegg

quote: I remember being upset because I was finally legal to drink in Canada, and I decided to throw that all away and move to America, where I had to wait another two years. I came here to do improv and to try to join the Groundlings.
name: Ryan Reynolds

quote: I'm more married to Sandy now than when we were married with the legal document. We're still married as parents.
name: Bobby Darin

quote: The Myth of Male Power dealt much more with the political issues, the legal issues, sexual harassment, date rape, women who kill, and those issues were very much more interfaced with the agendas of feminism.

quote: I believe wholeheartedly in marriage. I don't exclusively mean a marriage with a legal contract, but any relationship that constitutes a marriage because of the quality of their relationship.
name: Helen Reddy

quote: I wish the government and the Minister of Justice would address these legal and constitutional arguments, but they refuse to. They want Canadians to go blindly into their brave new world, but it is not wise for a society to move blindly in any direction.
name: Stockwell Day

quote: In the early centuries of Islam, the great schools of Islamic jurisprudence were built upon the above principles. Basic to all their legal systems they developed the doctrine that liberty is the fundamental basis of law.
name: Aly Khan

quote: Who most benefits from keeping marijuana illegal? The greatest beneficiaries are the major criminal organizations in Mexico and elsewhere that earn billions of dollars annually from this illicit trade - and who would rapidly lose their competitive advantage if marijuana were a legal commodity.
name: George Soros

quote: Our country was thereby saved from the consequences of its distracting individualistic conception of democracy, and its merely legal conception of nationality. It was because the followers of Jackson and Douglas did fight for it, that the Union was preserved.
name: Herbert Croly

quote: I think people should have the legal right to hurt themselves without fearing that they're going to get locked up for doing so. But on a personal level, if someone I loved was hurting himself or herself in front of me, I would, of course, try to restrain them.
name: Chester Brown

quote: Unfortunately, corruption is widespread in government agencies and public enterprises. Our political system promotes nepotism and wasting money. This has undermined our legal system and confidence in the functioning of the state. One of the consequences is that many citizens don't pay their taxes.
name: Georgios A. Papandreou

quote: I'm a hardcore libertarian - I want everything legal - but I also believe that you have the right to free association.
name: Penn Jillette

quote: We get information in the mail, the regular postal mail, encrypted or not, vet it like a regular news organization, format it - which is sometimes something that's quite hard to do, when you're talking about giant databases of information - release it to the public and then defend ourselves against the inevitable legal and political attacks.

quote: Outside of the Constitution we have no legal authority more than private citizens, and within it we have only so much as that instrument gives us. This broad principle limits all our functions and applies to all subjects.
name: Andrew Johnson

quote: Do not ghettoize society by putting people into legal categories of gender, race, ethnicity, language, or other such characteristics.
name: Preston Manning

quote: Above all, we must have great respect for these people who also suffer and who want to find their own way of correct living. On the other hand, to create a legal form of a kind of homosexual marriage, in reality, does not help these people.
name: Joseph Ratzinger

quote: And Americans realized that native people are still here, that they have a moral standing, a legal standing.
name: Dennis Banks

quote: You know, my first three or four drafts, you can see, are on legal pads in long hand. And then I go to a typewriter, and I know everybody's switching to a computer. And I'm sort of laughed at.
name: Robert Caro

quote: What we bring to the table is not only our 56 field offices in the United States and our number of resident agencies, but also we have 45 legal attaches overseas.
name: Robert Mueller

quote: In the US, you even lose legal rights if you store your data in a company's machines instead of your own. The police need to present you with a search warrant to get your data from you but if they are stored in a company's server, the police can get it without showing you anything.
name: Richard Stallman

quote: If you desire information on some point of law, you are not likely to ponder over the ponderous tomes of legal writers in order to obtain the knowledge you seek, by your own unaided efforts.
name: Felix Adler

quote: The American legal industry is a medieval guild in which the prosecutors, bar, and bench join hands to ensure that legal invoices are paid, no matter how excessive.
name: Conrad Black

quote: Intellectual property is an important legal and cultural issue. Society as a whole has complex issues to face here: private ownership vs. open source, and so on.
name: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: We've got fifty people at Gitmo that are too dangerous to be let go that will never go through a normal criminal trial. Let's create a new legal system, so they'll have their day in court.
name: Lindsey Graham

name: Lindsey Graham

quote: The emphasis on the birth of Christ tends to polarize our pluralistic society and create legal and ethnic belligerence.
name: John Clayton

quote: The Republican majority will stop at nothing to prevent access to the legal system for those who are hurt.
name: Joe Baca

quote: Mr. Speaker, the fact of the matter is that the Ten Commandments are a historical document that contains moral, ethical, and legal truisms that any person of any religion or even an atheist can recognize and appreciate.
name: Cliff Stearns

quote: Sadly, embryonic stem cell research is completely legal in this country and has been going on at universities and research facilities for years.
name: Mike Pence

quote: I would like it to be a legal requirement for all businesses to be linked to a charity.
name: Arabella Weir

quote: Driving at high speed where safe and legal is part of my life. As well as a higher top speed I wanted even better stability in my FX and that meant work on the aerodynamics.
name: Sebastian Vettel

quote: We have used the presence of UNMIK, as well as other European and American agencies to establish a legal framework compatible with the European Union and that is already an advantage. We have seen the positive effects of this and our parliament will continue to go this way.
name: Ibrahim Rugova

quote: Every neurosis is a primitive form of legal proceeding in which the accused carries on the prosecution, imposes judgment and executes the sentence: all to the end that someone else should not perform the same process.
name: Lionel Trilling

quote: Farming with live animals is a 7 day a week, legal form of slavery.
name: George Segal

quote: Torture is such a slippery slope as soon as you allow a society or any legal system to do that, almost instantly you get a situation where people are being tortured for very trivial reasons.
name: Iain Banks

quote: I'm coming out with my line of shoes and my very first shoe is called 'The Nethia.' How we came up with the name is that my legal name is Linnethia and we shortened it.
name: NeNe Leakes

quote: It is just called Continuing Legal Education. You can go to lectures, you can even listen to tapes on airplanes - they want you to stay current. So you do have to stay current to maintain your license even if you are not practicing.
name: Frank Shorter

quote: The kingdom of God is an order of government established by divine authority. It is the only legal government that can exist in any part of the universe.
name: Orson Pratt

quote: The advocates of abortion on demand falsely assume two things: that women must suffer if the lives of unborn children are legally protected and that women can only attain equality by having the legal option of destroying their innocent offspring in the womb.
name: Robert Casey

quote: Legal abortion will never rest easy on this nation's conscience.
name: Robert Casey

quote: Upon the Constitution, upon the pre-existing legal rights of the People, as understood in this country and in England, I have argued that this House is bound to revive the Petition under debate.
name: Caleb Cushing

quote: I write in longhand on yellow legal pads.
name: Beverly Cleary

quote: It is a sign of the times that the absence of meaningful ID requirements in many states leaves our voting process vulnerable to fraud and allows legal votes to be cancelled out by illegally cast ballots.
name: Virgil Goode

quote: However saying that I totally support the concept of civil partnerships in the eyes of the law, and think it a disgrace that same sex couples have had to wait so long for legal rights, protection and recognition.
name: Adam Rickitt

quote: In the Brown decision, the United States Supreme Court unanimously struck down the legal and moral footing of racially segregated public education in this country.
name: Bobby Scott

quote: I also urge the Obama administration - both on its own and in cooperation with other responsible governments around the world - to use all legal means necessary to shut down WikiLeaks before it can do more damage by releasing additional cables. name: Joe Lieberman

quote: One thing I was thinking about is that they probably get their come-uppance about the same percentage that people in real life do. Basically, stealing for all practical purposes might as well be legal in New York.
name: Mike Judge

quote: I wish that there were more stringent laws to make guns sold anywhere that they're legal harder to get.
name: Rosie O'Donnell

quote: Insofar as international law is observed, it provides us with stability and order and with a means of predicting the behavior of those with whom we have reciprocal legal obligations.
name: J. William Fulbright

quote: The more expansive government is, the more perils people face in daily lives, be it from IRS agents or from child support services, or from other agencies that often have little or no legal restraints on their power.
name: James Bovard

quote: Every year, some 65,000 high school students - many of them star students and leaders in their communities - are unable to go to college or get a good job because they have no legal status.
name: Gary Locke

quote: I support making sure that there are legal protects for everyone.
name: Debbie Stabenow

quote: I don't even talk about whether or not racial profiling is legal. I just don't think racial profiling is a particularly good law enforcement tool.
name: Eric Holder

quote: Fifty percent of our country that we own, have all legal jurisdiction, have all rights to do whatever we want, lies beneath the sea and we have better maps of Mars than that 50 percent.
name: Robert Ballard

quote: In this life and death case, I felt Mrs. Schiavo should receive the fullest due process from our legal system.
name: Paul Gillmor

quote: FOR a long time the conviction has been dimly felt in the community that, without prejudice to existing institutions, the legal day of weekly rest might be employed to advantage for purposes affecting the general good.
name: Felix Adler

quote: Let me remind you that nuclear disarmament is not just an ardent desire of the people, as expressed in many resolutions of the United Nations. It is a legal commitment by the five official nuclear states, entered into when they signed the Non-Proliferation Treaty.
name: Joseph Rotblat

quote: I've led a school whose faculty and students examine and discuss and debate every aspect of our law and legal system. And what I've learned most is that no one has a monopoly on truth or wisdom. I've learned that we make progress by listening to each other, across every apparent political or ideological divide.
name: Elena Kagan

quote: I think that the proposed constitution is one of the European legal documents with the strongest social dimension I have seen since I began following European issues.
name: Jean-Pierre Raffarin

quote: The legal principle placing the burden of proof on accusers rather than the accused can be traced back to Second and Third Century Roman jurist, Julius Paulus Prudentissimus. Yet, this ancient concept, which forms the legal and moral cornerstone of the American judicial system, is quickly being undermined in the name of 'national security.'
name: Bob Barr

quote: History has shown us that, on extraordinarily rare occasions, it becomes necessary for the federal government to intervene on behalf of individuals whose 14th Amendment rights to legal due process and equal protection may be violated by a state.
name: Michael K. Simpson

quote: The legal difference between the sit-ins and the Freedom Riders was significant.
name: Constance Baker Motley

quote: King consciously steered away from legal claims and instead relied on civil disobedience.
name: Constance Baker Motley

quote: In high school, I discovered myself. I was interested in race relations and the legal profession. I read about Lincoln and that he believed the law to be the most difficult of professions.
name: Constance Baker Motley

quote: I never thought I would live long enough to see the legal profession change to the extent it has.
name: Constance Baker Motley

quote: Sooner or later they are going to live in a New York City where gay marriage is not only legal, but it's common and they don't even notice.
name: Anthony Weiner

quote: I mean you might say he had a travelling post office, but also Barney was very, very active. He was a legal officer for the NAACP and they had a lot of problems after Pease.
name: Betty Hill

quote: While I support immigration regulated through a legal framework, I do not support rewarding those who broke the law to get here.
name: Kit Bond

quote: Testimony should be a philosophical problem and not limited to legal or historical contexts where it refers to the account of a witness who reports what he has seen.
name: Paul Ricoeur

quote: People spend so much time in their cars, and it's a legal way to have fun by speeding a little bit or testing yourself a little bit, and you get to invest in your car. For some people, it becomes their baby.
